sentences.english: God is revealed in the hiddenness of the external form.
sentences.chinese: 神的啓示隱藏於外在的形體中。

sentences.english: The information acquisition technique of intersected primitive based on combined relationship is provided.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於形體組合關係的相交基元體信息獲取技術。

sentences.english: To bring colour to this shape, texturing is required.
sentences.chinese: 要給這個形體上色，需要貼圖。

sentences.english: Human form serves many purposes within the Tao.
sentences.chinese: 人類形體服務於道內許多意圖。

sentences.english: The genetic material then transcribes the thought-form into physicality, which is known as form.
sentences.chinese: 隨後基因材料把思想形態轉錄到肉體性，即形體。

sentences.english: Structure of heliostat is unusual and different from common ones.
sentences.chinese: 定日鏡結構的形體特殊，不同於普通的建築結構。

sentences.english: The Chopper VX is a very lightly armored Transformer.
sentences.chinese: VX機甲是非常輕裝甲的變形體。

sentences.english: Inseparate are omnipresent being and your own form.
sentences.chinese: 不可分者乃無在不在的存在和你自己的形體。

sentences.english: One of Chinese writing system' s attributes is the demonstration of distinctiveness in character components.
sentences.chinese: 漢字形體區別特徵是漢字系統的一項客觀屬性。

sentences.english: There are so many preoccupations that sever the heart from communicating with the rest of the form.
sentences.chinese: 有很多偏見，切斷了心靈與形體其他部分的溝通。

sentences.english: In China, Body Arts & Sciences International (BASI) is one of the most common certification programs.
sentences.chinese: 在中國國際形體和科學組織是一個最普通的培訓學院。

sentences.english: The full extent of the form is visible when the lid is closed.
sentences.chinese: 當蓋被閉合時，能看到形體的整個範圍。

sentences.english: The windowpane lightens the profile and adds a dash of sporting athleticism to the cut.
sentences.chinese: 窗格紋會增亮形體且給裁剪帶上一點大方的運動精神。

sentences.english: The five zang-organs, the body and all the orifices form an organic whole.
sentences.chinese: 五臟與形體諸竅聯結成一個整體。

sentences.english: As the pus leaves, soul more readily anchors into the form.
sentences.chinese: 當膿液離開時，靈魂就更容易錨定到形體中。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
